title: Special Education Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at ACDS (Scarsdale, NY) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: This was a positive experience. Phone interview, physical interview, demo lesson and then paperwork with HR for hiring process. The onboarding process can be lengthy but once started it runs smoothly.
Interview Questions: How I would differentiate a diverse classroom.

title: TA Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at ACDS (Plainview, NY) in May 2012
Interview Descriptions: There was a lot of paperwork to fill out. In addition, getting an appointment for your PPD is often difficult when you are eager to work, and having to wait for it to be read.
